resources.string: We hope you enjoy using this application. Your opinion is very important to us, so we would ask you to rate application and visit our page on Facebook. You can also do it later on \"Help\" page.
Shows list of stations with updated prices

This app helps you to locate LPG refilling stations in Israel.
 It allows you to select the station and get driving direction using your favorite navigation application.

 Usage:
 On start it tries to find your position.
 You can scroll around a map and click on points, to see information about station.
 If you will click on station's information window, app will suggest you to choose navigation program.
 And you can go!

 Currently, there is no full data about all stations in Israel.
 If you can update any information about refilling stations, please contact an author:
